channel.title: Time on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Time on Silence Speaks

item.title: Take Time
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: The perma-pedestrian Watched in awe Of the passing cars. Each driver longs To extend their life With Audis & Jaguars. Each piston obeys Thermodynamic law Exploding every decisecond. The law of inertia Transfers heat to our heads Upon braking at the intersection. The human VROOMS. Huffs and FUMES. Shortcircuits- KaBOOMS! The cycle repeats Until there remains No more lives to lose.
